name: LT Task Hub - TEST
description:
Welcome to LT Task Hub â€” a unified system for managing tasks, goals, and KPIs across the entire Liga.Tennis club network.

This app connects the daily work of every employee with the company's strategic goals. Here we plan tasks, track progress using Kanban and the Eisenhower Matrix, and achieve results together.

The automated Points system and real-time KPI dashboards make our workflow transparent and motivating, allowing everyone to see their contribution to our overall success. Our goal is to enhance operational efficiency, improve cross-departmental coordination, and make decisions based on real data.
